title: Innodisk expands edge AI applications and intelligent solution at Computex 2024 with new brand strategy
summary: Innodisk, a leading global AI solution provider, is expanding its edge AI applications and intelligent solutions at Computex 2024. The company is showcasing its latest industrial-grade CXL 2.0 memory expansion, E3.S SSD, and innovative MIPI over Type-C camera technology for machine vision. Innodisk is also demonstrating its smart manufacturing PPE recognition and intelligent people tracking solutions, which leverage AI computing technologies to improve safety and efficiency.

title: Innodisk unveils edge AI applications and intelligent solution at Computex 2024 with new brand strategy
summary: Innodisk, a global AI solution provider, will showcase its comprehensive new products at Computex 2024 with a focus on edge AI. Key highlights include the industry's pioneering CXL 2.0 memory expansion, E3.S SSD, and innovative MIPI over Type-C technology for machine vision. Innodisk will also unveil its new brand vision, "Architect Intelligence," bringing out its commitment to building intelligent solutions with global partners.
